home_job: Full stack web developer, UI/UX designer, freelancer, Github addict.
about_desc: Hello there, my name is PHILL LIN and i love doing stuff for internet espacially open-source projects. My love for the development started when i was 14: i was playing a french video game called Dofus and i wanted to automate repetitive things so i built a bot for the game (it's not fair i know üôÅ). Now, i mainly develop MERN stack apps, i'm open to new opportunities.
